p: SPSS 13.0 software (SPSS Inc., Chicago, IL) was used for statistical analysis. The count data were presented in percentage; the normal distribution data in the measurement data was presented in the mean Â± standard deviation. The non-normal distribution data was presented in the form of it is presented in the form of digits (range). The measurement data adopt the Independent Samples T-test, and the enumeration data adopt the chi-square test and Fisher exact probability. Multivariable analysis was done by Logistic regression, Enter method, to evaluate the risk factors of transient and long-term hypoparathyroidism. P < 0.05 was considered statistically different.
